summary: Admin Onboarding via Invite Link/QR feature fully tested. All 18 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend UI testing completed successfully - all tabs, dialogs, and flows working correctly.

user_management_page.usuarios_tab: PASS - Shows 30 users with correct stats
user_management_page.solicitudes_tab: PASS - Shows 4 pending, 2 approved, 1 rejected with badge count
user_management_page.invitaciones_tab: PASS - Shows invitation list with correct statuses

invitation_management.create_invitation_dialog: PASS - Shows expiration options (7/30/90/365 days) and usage limits (single/unlimited/fixed)
invitation_management.invitation_list_statuses: PASS - Shows Active, Revoked, Límite alcanzado correctly
invitation_management.qr_code_dialog: PASS - Shows QR code, link, and copy/open buttons

access_request_management.approve_dialog: PASS - Shows user info, welcome message field, email notification checkbox
access_request_management.reject_dialog: PASS - Shows user info, rejection reason field, email notification checkbox

public_join_page.valid_token: PASS - Shows condominium name (Residencial Las Palmas), all form fields present
public_join_page.invalid_token: PASS - Shows 'Invitación No Válida' error with 'Ir al Inicio' button
public_join_page.form_fields: PASS - Name, Email, Phone, Apartment, Tower, Resident Type, Notes all present

seed_data_creation: Created multiple test invitations and access requests during backend testing (prefixed with TEST_)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Admin Onboarding via Invite Link/QR feature is fully functional. Backend APIs: POST/GET/DELETE /api/invitations, GET /api/invitations/{token}/info (public), POST /api/invitations/{token}/request (public), GET /api/access-requests, POST /api/access-requests/{id}/action. Frontend: 3 tabs in UserManagementPage (Usuarios, Solicitudes with badge count, Invitaciones), public JoinPage at /join/{token}. Email sending uses Resend which is configured.

features_verified.admin_can_revoke_active_invitation: VERIFIED - Revoke button works, status changes to 'Revocada'
features_verified.resident_can_submit_access_request: VERIFIED - Form submission works, creates pending request
features_verified.access_request_appears_in_admin_solicitu: VERIFIED - Badge count shows pending requests
features_verified.admin_can_approve_request_user_created: VERIFIED - Approve dialog creates user account
features_verified.admin_can_reject_request: VERIFIED - Reject dialog with reason field works
features_verified.qr_code_dialog_works: VERIFIED - QR code displayed with copy/open buttons
features_verified.copy_link_works: VERIFIED - Copy button available in QR dialog and invitation row
features_verified.status_check_on_public_page: VERIFIED - API endpoint works for checking request status
